titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of educational toys entered in January 1 through August 29, 2003.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/6/2006--Introduced. Directs the Bureau of Customs and Border Protection to liquidate or reliquidate certain entries of educational toys and refund any amounts owed.
